TEXT.TITLE: JEFFERIES MAKING MARKET IN STORAGE TECHNOLOGY
TEXT.BODY: Jefferies Group Inc said it is making a market in Storage Technology Corp <QSTK.O>. The firm said the first bid was 3-1/2 and the first offer was 3-5/8. Reuter
